name: Loading Bar: The Clicker Game
description:
Loading Bar: The Clicker Game

Is.... a clicker game about a loading bar.

It has a fun ending too :)

You can find the code I used for the game here: Loading Bar Game Code

You can find some of the sprite sheets I made here: Sprites

And the music I made on Beepbox: Beepbox

The sound effect I made on sfxr:  sfxr

Note: I may release more versions in the future other than Microsoft... I'm not sure
